name: Kart-On 2
description:
A downloadable game for Windows

Kart-On! 2 is an exciting new racing game that will take you on a wild ride through a world of cardboard. Developed by a team of five game art students as their final school project, this game is packed with colorful graphics, easy controls and a variety of different karts to choose from, you'll be able to speed through the competition and leave your opponent in the dust.


• A colorful and creative world, full of nostalgic objects and memories from your childhood.

• Local multiplayer so you can drive against your friends.

• A wide variety of cars to choose from so you can beat your opponent in style!

• Easy controls to master and get good at the game.





joystick = move

r1 = drift

Download it now :)
